title: Sidewall, 1788
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Vertical rectangle featuring an arabesque design. At bottom, two griffons on a base with drapery in pink greens and beige; beneath a vase of flowers with birds on the handles. In center, a diamond-shaped medallion with classical subject on black background, framed with laurel bands and foliage garlands of roses and scrolls of foliage interspersed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1788.
1788. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-332.
